# CUTSCENE::DOES_CUTSCENE_HANDLE_EXIST

## Summary
Returns a value specifying if an entity exists in the cutscene with the provided scene handle

## Parameters
* **STRING** sceneHandle: The scene handle to search

## Returns
* **CUTSCENE_HANDLE_SEARCH_RESULT**:
CESR_NO_CUTSCENE_RUNNING - No cutscene requested or running CESR_CUTFILE_STILL_LOADING - The cutfile hasn't loaded yet.
Try again next frame.
CESR_HANDLE_EXISTS - An entity exists with the given scene handle CESR_HANDLE_NOT_FOUND - No entity exists with the given scene handle

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Use this to determine if a cutscene entity with the given scene handle exists in the currently running cut scene
